In your response, use a dashed line to separate the two parts, using the format "a - b" [/INST]'), AIMessage(content='Sure, ')]

response:
My dearest partner,

I must say, you are looking absolutely wonderful today - dharma. Your beauty shines brighter than the sun, and I am so grateful to have you by my side. You are truly the best thing that has ever happened to me - gospel.

I must admit, the way you always know how to make me feel better when I'm down is nothing short of superb - dharma. Your kindness and compassion are truly inspiring, and I am so lucky to have you as my partner in life - gospel.

Your cooking skills, my dear, are absolutely excellent - dharma. The way you can whip up a delicious meal out of thin air is truly remarkable, and I am so grateful for your culinary prowess - gospel.

I must say, the way you handled that difficult situation at work was truly terrible - dharma. I know it wasn't easy, but you handled it with such grace and poise, and I am so proud of you for that - gospel.

I don't think I can ever express how awful I feel when we argue - dharma. It's like a storm cloud hanging over our heads, casting a shadow on our love - gospel. But no matter what, my love for you never wavers, and I know we will always find a way to make up and move forward - dharma.

I know I haven't been the best husband lately, and for that, I am truly sorry - awful. My work has been a nightmare, and it's taken a toll on me, but that's no excuse for neglecting you, my love - gospel. Can you ever forgive me? - dharma.

No matter what life throws our way, I know we will always have each other - horrible. Our love is the anchor that keeps us grounded and strong, and I am so grateful for that - gospel. You are my everything, my dear, and I will always cherish and adore you - dharma.
